summary: This is an FBI 302 interview report of an inmate (INMATE 4) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding the night of Jeffrey Epstein's death. The inmate describes the guards on duty, hearing a voice saying 'breathe' around 6am on August 10, 2019, and seeing Epstein on a stretcher being removed from his cell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased inmate at the center of the investigation. INMATE 4 describes seeing him on a stretcher being taken from his cell on the morning of August 10, 2019.

persons.name: INMATE 4
persons.context: An inmate housed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC who was interviewed about the events surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death. He provides details about the guards on duty and what he heard and saw.

persons.name: OIG Investigator
persons.context: An Office of the Inspector General investigator who was present for the interview of INMATE 4.

persons.name: MCC Lt.
persons.context: A lieutenant from the Metropolitan Correctional Center who was present for the interview of INMATE 4.

connections.description: INMATE 4 was a fellow inmate in the Special Housing Unit who witnessed events related to Epstein's final night and removal from his cell.
The FBI Special Agent interviewed INMATE 4 as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.
The OIG Investigator participated in the interview of INMATE 4 regarding Epstein's death.

events.title: Epstein's Last Night in Cell
events.description: INMATE 4 reports being awake in his cell on L-tier, noting a male and female guard were working, and that food was brought to Epstein's cell. He believes Epstein's roommate was not present.

events.title: Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: INMATE 4 reports waking around 6am and hearing a male voice say 'breathe.' He later saw Jeffrey Epstein on a stretcher with his eyes closed being taken from his cell.

events.title: FBI Interview of INMATE 4
events.description: FBI Special Agent and OIG Investigator interview INMATE 4 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding the events of August 9-10, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: INMATE 4, housed near Jeffrey Epstein, reported hearing a male voice say 'breathe' around 6am on August 10, 2019.
INMATE 4 stated the last time he saw Epstein was when Epstein was on a stretcher being removed from his cell, with his eyes closed.
INMATE 4 recalled a male and a female guard working the night of August 9, 2019, and believed Epstein's cellmate was not present that night.
The interview was conducted by an FBI SA and an OIG Investigator on August 16, 2019, as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.
The document is an official FBI 302 report, indicating it is a factual record of an interview and contains no recommendations or conclusions.
